hints.content:
To find how many meters the $\goldE{\text{Squirrel}}$ ran, we start with how many meters $\blueE{\text{Fox}}$ ran, and add $\maroonD{7\text{ meters}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/64e72f9d5da7f8ced431699af1678002a0bfc77a)

$\blueE{5} + \maroonD{7} = \goldE{\Box}$

Let's add to find how far $\goldE{\text{Squirrel}}$ ran.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/eff41af04bcd9d79786fde4f74fa80a760c13ead)

$\blueE{5} + \maroonD{7} = \goldE{12}$

question.content:
A fox ran $5$ meters. 

A squirrel ran $7$ meters farther than the fox. 

**How far did the squirrel run?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] meters
